text: evarkal nampikkai kontu narceyalkal ceykirarkalo avarkal corkkankalil pukuttappatuvarkal. Atil niraruvikal totarntu otikkonte irukkum. Tankal iraivanin kattalaippati atil avarkal enrenrum tankivituvarkal. Avarkalil (oruvar marroruvarai nokki ‘‘unkalukku totarntu) iterram (salam) untavatakuka!'' Enru mukaman kuruvarkal
